scripts.build: npm run install-all && cd backend && npx prisma generate && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:prod: npm run install-all && cd backend && npx prisma generate && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage --watchAll=false
